title: Can't load into games
body: As the title says. Just started playing league after a couple days and on my first game, couldn't even get to the loading screen. As soon as the screen goes black (before the loading champs), I get bugsplatted. If i hit reconnect, I get bugsplatted. tried repairing client, restarting comp and running on either client. Still happens without fail. Any help?

replies.body: Bugsplatting while loading can happen if you have bad drivers, game files, or even hardware.  Run through the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
